rows.label: tlk4235014801_msg0001
rows.name:
Zadazan will occupy this place until Don Dón-sama
returns... no, I mean, guard it, mo.

rows.label: tlk4235014801_msg0002
rows.name:
I won't do anything bad anymore, mo!
...That's right, I'll tell you something good, mo.

rows.label: tlk4235014801_msg0003
rows.name:
Have you ever seen the letters from
Bahn's mother, mo?

rows.label: tlk4235014801_msg0004
rows.name:
Zadazan wrote those, mo.
Zadazan has a talent for writing, mo.

rows.label: tlk4235014801_msg0005
rows.name:
His real mother got fed up with
Dón-sama and left a long time ago, mo.

rows.label: tlk4235014801_msg0006
rows.name:
It might have been the right
choice, mo...
